title: Team Members \m/
body:
Looking for team members specially who don't go AFK or Feed i am Bronze3 but soon will go to gold, because i know i am capable of, i am looking for team mates who can play Top, Jg, Adc and Sup i play mid Most of the time if your interested let me know fill up the details and i will add you also avoid using foul language to your/ enemy team :) also last thing rank doesn't matter as i know many people out there who can't climb coz of other stupid people like {{champion:74}} 

Name
IGN
Role
Top 3 Picks
Rank

replies.body:
Name Barark
IGN Barark
Role Top
Top 3 Picks Gnar Sion Darius
Rank Silver

> Name Barark
> IGN Barark
> Role Top
> Top 3 Picks Gnar Sion Darius
> Rank Silver

got ya

Name: Spiriti
IGN: Spiriti
Role: Support or Top
Top 3 picks: Supp - Sona, Thresh, Braum
Top - Renekton, Mundo, Shen
I'm pretty willing to learn whatever is needed
Rank, was bronze 3 last season, havent done placements yet

i just added you ^^
Get to Gold first. If you're going to be captain I want to see your individual progress before deciding to join.

Hahaha i will, i just need people to form a team, and play as a 5 you will see soon, keep stalking at me XD so u will know XD
